title: Who's craftier, the criminal or the detective? - Quora

response.answer_text: The patrol officer who advises the detective to make him look smarter than the criminal. Detectives live in a insulated Ivory Tower and don’t know which suspect lives in which district or what that guy is good for pulling. The patrol officer is constantly bumping into the bad guys - every day - on the street. The patrol officer gets to know the weaknesses of every bad guy and helps the detective use those weaknesses to the detective’s advantage. It’s a team effort. Either one alone can muddle through but it’s better to have them work together.
